description.value:
Whether you carry two identical weapons or a useful sidearm, your signature weapon is paired, threatening your quarry with a storm of blows. You gain a paired bloodseeker as a secondary tool, which is a level 0 common one-handed simple or martial weapon of your choice. You can designate a different one-handed weapon as your second blade when you @UUID[Compendium.pf2e-playtest-data.rr-playtest-actions.Item.Wagb9XE34NpQQ8yy]{Reinforce your Arsenal}, transferring your special adjustments to it.

Your paired bloodseeker gains the initial benefit of your @UUID[Compendium.pf2e-playtest-data.rr-playtest-class-features.Item.Nl1Aqj6JTdMv0qbB]{Bloodseeking Blade} signature tool, except that you roll d4s instead of d6s for the additional damage. It also gains the specialized arsenal benefit when your bloodseeking blade signature tool does. You can use Honed Strike, or any other ability that requires you to wield or Strike with a bloodseeking blade signature tool, with your paired bloodseeker instead.

@UUID[Compendium.pf2e-playtest-data.rr-playtest-effects.Item.uCzopTPhAXrFEGTD]{Effect: Paired Bloodseeker}
